gen:link.msg:message: `Assets` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_BalanceSheetBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit2_Assets')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_BalanceSheetBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit2_Assets return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_BalanceSheetBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit2_ChildrenOfAssetsDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_BalanceSheetBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit2_ChildrenOfAssetsDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_BalanceSheetBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit2_ChildrenOfAssetsCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_BalanceSheetBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit2_ChildrenOfAssetsCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
`BalanceSheetBeforeAfterAppropriationResults` SHOULD not exist for any period other than the current period.

`BondsOtherFixedIncomeSecurities` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_BalanceSheetBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit1_BondsOtherFixedIncomeSecurities')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_BalanceSheetBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit1_BondsOtherFixedIncomeSecurities return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_BalanceSheetBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit1_ChildrenOfBondsOtherFixedIncomeSecuritiesDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_BalanceSheetBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit1_ChildrenOfBondsOtherFixedIncomeSecuritiesDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_BalanceSheetBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit1_ChildrenOfBondsOtherFixedIncomeSecuritiesCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_BalanceSheetBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit1_ChildrenOfBondsOtherFixedIncomeSecuritiesCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
